feed.title: Kanshi Protocol
feed.subtitle: I'm exploring Cyber Security, AI, and different programming languages! I use Elixir and Python for my company's projects. I love Elixir so it's great that I get to use it for work. But I want to learn a more "low level" language. So, I'm using AI to help me learn about Cyber Security and how I can leverage my experience of mostly Backend Web Development to build tools to help detect and remediate vulnerabilities in an ever growing threat landscape.
